articles.title: Texas 6-week abortion ban to remain in force, federal appeals court says - CNN
articles.description: The 5th US Circuit Court of Appeals said Thursday that it will allow Texas' controversial new law that bars abortions after about six weeks of pregnancy to stay in force while it considers an appeal of a judge's order blocking it.
